Nemesis Enforcer/The Oblitercons/Jaws/Punch:




Nemesis received DevilDuer's communique and responded via comm.  "I'll 
dispatch aid to you.  Give these new *members* quarters, I'll want to speak 
with them soon enough." he spoke into his wrist comm. unit, opening a new 
connection with Punch.  "Send Jaws and team of maintenace robots to salvage 
that ship close to the base," he said, walking into the lab.

Dark One and Mortar step to the sides of the doorway, giving Nemesis room to 
enter, Pyro, Hiss, and Scrapper bringing the rear.

"Well, Wheeljack, is it?  What is this spy mission you speak of?"

---

Punch sent a transmission to Jaws instructing to him wait close to the ship 
until maintenance droids arrived to aid him, and Jaws did so.  While he waits 
Punch sent a transmission to the automatons and two dozen maintenace droids 
were off to aid Jaws in his tiny mission.
